title: 'Estampa flamenca'
creator_credit: Dave Ellis and Dave Ellis Films
brief_description: This film features Maria Benitez, one of the world’s great flamenco dancers, in rehearsal and performance in her native New Mexico. She discusses the Gypsy and Spanish origins of flamenco with members of her dance company, Estampa Flamenca. Narrated by Jose Rodriguez
